sentence: Coty Inc. ( COTY ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 30, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.125 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 14, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased COTY prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 8th quarter that COTY has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $12.71, the dividend yield is 3.93%.
The previous trading day's last sale of COTY was $12.71, representing a -41.37% decrease from the 52 week high of $21.68 and a 18.45% increase over the 52 week low of $10.73.
COTY is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
COTY's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is -$.22.
Zacks Investment Research reports COTY's forecasted earnings growth in 2019 as 9.57%, compared to an industry average of 4.8%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the COTY Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
